deck: Continuity Associates is a studio producing primarily comics-based art product in multiple markets: from comic-book packaging to storyboarding to advertising concepts to design to the occasional publishing endeavor.
description:
In 1971 Neal Adams and Dick Giordano joined forces once again-- hot off their successful collaboration on the artwork for DC's newly "relevant" Green Lantern/Green Arrow Comic book, to found Continuity Associates.

CA served early on as a packager of comic books for various publishers, including Charlton, where Giordano had once been Executive Editor, and Marvel. And early on into advertising art, including the lucrative world of design, concepting and storyboarding, as well as conceptual design for motion pictures and the occasional self-published title (under their Continuity Comics imprint) and character (including the moderately well-known Ms. Mystic and space-opera bunny Bucky O'Hare).

A huge number of young up-and-coming talents in the comics field worked at Continuity (not all of whom emulated Adams' multilinear, lightly-lined style so unfortunately later aped by the likes of the Image Comics founders) including Michael Golden, Howard Chaykin, Val Mayerik, Jim Starlin, Al Milgrom, Larry Hama, Walt Simonson, Bob Wiacek, and others. Often the studio would collectively ink a job, signing the work "Crusty Bunkers."

The organization later changed its name to Continuity Studios and remains in business today.
name: Continuity Studios

deck: A talented colorist working with Work Horse Comics, and Dark Elf Designs.
name: Cathy Gouin

deck: Born in Argentina he got to be part of Altercomics Studios and that was his way into comics. Some of the comics in which he paticipated are "Hybrid" for Studio-407, "Agon" for Zenescope Entertainment, " El General San Martin" for Ovni Press, God is Dead for Avatar Press and Legion of Bounce for MTJ Publishing. Currently he's working on the series "Spy Bounce" for MTJ Publishing.
name: Pablo Churin

deck: Jed Tucker Whedon is a screenwriter and musician. Jed is from a family of writers: he is the son of screenwriter Tom Whedon, grandson of screenwriter John Whedon, and the brother of screenwriter Zack Whedon and producer/director/writer Joss Whedon.
name: Jed Whedon

deck:
George Sportelli is a comic book artist specializing in pin-up style illustrations and is noted for rendering of voluptuous comic women.

His work has been compiled in several comic books.
name: George Sportelli

deck: Artist on creators edge press comic ZFW.  Will be ongoing artist for the series.

deck: Writer, letterer and producer of Misery Depot. Hermés was born in Montevideo, Uruguay, and now lives in Barcelona. A Software Engineer by education, it's no surprise that he finds himself most comfortable writing blueprints of stories in the form of comic book scripts.
name: Hermés Piqué

deck: Penciller, inker and colorist of Misery Depot.
description: Juan Romera was born on August 26, 1977, in Bahía Blanca, Argentina. He developed an early interest in comics; even before learning to read, his father had to bring a comic home after each visit to the newstand. Around that time he began to draw, and he never stopped. During 2003, Juan edited the fanzine Toxicomix along with a group of friends. He enjoyed so much seeing his stories in print that he went to draw for fanzines all over Argentina, Spain and Brasil,
name: Juan Romera

story_arc_credits.name: God of Fear, God of War

deck: Dwayne Harris is an american comic book artist and writer.
description: Dwayne Harris has been a freelance writer/illustrator for over 10 years, working for several publishers on a wide variety of properties. Getting his start in the RPG industry illustrating properties like GAME OF THRONES, his first comic book publication was in Heavy Metal Magazine, which he continues to contribute to. Next he teamed with Kieron Gillon on WARHAMMER: CROWN OF DESTRUCTION for Boom comics. Since then Dwayne has written and drawn the graphic novels BLACK POWDER for Asylum Press, as well as JOHN HENRY: THE STEAM AGE and AMNESIA, both for Arcana. AMNESIA was recently optioned by Sony Pictures to be developed into a major motion picture. Dwayne, a “Spectrum” award-winning artist, currently lives and works in Montana.
name: Dwayne Harris

deck: Visual artist, writer, and creator who supports the digital comic format, and sees it as a means of expanding the horizon of comics, and expanding the readership. Briefly worked with Vinnie Vincent former Vinnie Vincent Invasion, and Ex-Kiss guitarist on a comic project before moving onto his own creator owned stories, and projects.
name: Quentin Aaron
